channel.title: Docker Compose on Go Ahead
channel.description: Recent content in Docker Compose on Go Ahead

item.title: Advanced CircleCI docker testing
item.description: In a recent blog post I talked about automating the testing of an advanced GopherJS library using a combination of QUnit, Ginkgo and Agouti. That allowed me to run a complete integration test suite against my library by automatically spinning up browsers and pointing them at my QUnit GopherJS page. This was a great start, but after running it a couple of times we find that there are several problems:
